revised_title: Tongue Structure and Cancerous Excrescences Treatment
tldr: The author describes a new method of removing a portion of the tongue with cancerous excrescences using ligatures, which has led to a significant improvement in the treatment of such disorders. The study also reveals that the internal structure of the tongue is less irritable than other parts of the body and that the nerves of the tongue can be easily compressed, which is crucial for understanding the organ's function and treating diseases.
